premise_source_doc_sentence: He is portrayed by Hugo Weaving  (  and briefly by Ian Bliss  )  in the films and voiced by Christopher Corey Smith in The Matrix : Path of Neo .

Ian Bliss is an Australian actor , best known for his role as Bane in The Matrix Reloaded and The Matrix Revolutions , for which he was chosen by the Wachowskis because of his accurate impersonation of Hugo Weaving  (  Agent Smith  )  , and also his partial resemblance to Weaving .
